name: Spuzzle - Space Puzzle.
description:
This is a two-man project to test out Unreal Engines Blueprint system and generally trying to get a better feel of how it feels to work inside of the engine itself.

This project took us about 2 weeks to make from start to scratch.

Most of the time were spent on getting the actor to work properly and the level changer that required some help from a friend of ours. Other than that, this was a fun project all in itself.

We made a login, loading and menu screen but we did not figure out how to implement it correctly for it to work. 

Nonetheless, we're happy with the results!

Check out our Artstation pages below.

Sam: https://www.artstation.com/rawpuwnz

Andres: https://www.artstation.com/remired
